rooms.description: Spacious living room with Art Deco elements and luxury finishes, central hub of the home. Features built-in seating and ambient lighting.
Open-plan kitchen with luxury appliances and modern fixtures while respecting Vastu guidelines by positioning it in the Southeast direction for positivity.
Larger master bedroom with Art Deco details and high-end finishes. West-facing window to align with Vastu and allow cooling breezes.
Dedicated home theater room with acoustic paneling, ambient lighting, and state-of-the-art AV system. Oriented towards the North-East for optimum acoustics and energy flow.
Cozy library space with integrated shelving and elegant seating, positioned in the Northeast to enhance concentration and positive energies.

Functional servants quarters that provide privacy and convenience. Designed as a compact area near the kitchen for easy access while respecting Vastu norms by being located in the South-West region of the floor plan.

openings.description: Grand Art Deco styled entrance door on the Western facade to align with plot orientation and luxury appeal.
